Portal 2 is in every single way, aspect and view, better than portal. Other than it having multiplayer and better graphics / audio, Portal 2 offers longer play time, better puzzles and game-play, much better characters and level design. Portal set the bar for the sequel, and Portal 2 broke it beyond excpectations. There is so little amounts of wrong in this game that it has been so much fun, Ive played it only a few times, but it has been the most fun Ive had while "thinking with portals".

I have completed this game upwards of 10 times now and i have to say that this is one of my favourite single player games to this day. The gameplay is smooth and fun, the puzzles are challenging, the characters are believable and funny, and the co-op is a blast. I highly recommend this game to anyone looking for a fun, challenging, story-driven puzzle game.
Jogo muito show

Portal 2 é maravilhoso, trouxe elementos novos muito interessantes, além de trazer mais informações sobre a aperture laboratories. Ter mais personagens tornou o jogo mais interessante nos diálogos. O modo cooperativo também é muito bom. A única coisa que não gostei muito foi dos bônus, ainda prefiro os do portal 1 que tem objetivos e limites definidos.
I like portal 2 and the whole franshise.

Okay, Portal 2 is a puzzle game disguised as a 1st person shooter. Excellent design, great humor and vast improvements over the first game. Contains an epic rant about lemons. What are you waiting for?

Jogo incrível, mecânicas inovadoras, gráficos lindos para a época e atuais até hoje, jogabilidade fluída, extremamente divertido e conteúdo feito pela comunidade que garante com que sempre hajam fases para ser jogadas mesmo depois de finalizar o game. Recomendadíssimo!!!

It's cool that the game that took the premise of using a handheld device to solve puzzles in a massive robot-aided research facility made a sequel, as well as a co-op mode and level editor is really neat. I've been playing this game for a while, but now I get to review it.
